original: Edlund, Einar Fredrik, rådman, Norrköping, f. 13/5/84 i Örebro av kontr :i)roisten Karl Erik E. o. Hulda Björkman. G. 18 m. Karin Paulini. Barn: Sven f. 19, Ingrid 22. — Mog:-ex. i Örebro 02, jur. prel:ex. i Upps. 03, hovr:ex. 06. E. o. not. i Svea hovr. 06, tf. domhav. 09-10 o. 13-15, bitr. länsnot. i Jönköp. 1. 11-12, tf. rådm. i Jönköp. 12, tredje stadsnot. i Norrköp. 15, andre as’sessor 22, förste dito 23, tredje rådm. 25, andre dito 35 o. förste dito samt ordf. å rådhusr. andra avd. sed. 41. AuditÖr v. krigsr. i Norrköp. 17-19. Omb :man h. Norrk. Ensk. Bank (num. Östergötl. Ensk. Bank) i Norrköp. sed. 20, ordf. i bygign:ndn sed. 25, i styr. f. Norrköp. hand:gymn. sed. 35 o. i gen :planebe-redn. sed. 37, v. ordf. i kristidsstyr. sed. 39. RNO, RVO, Norrköp. stads S:t OlofsM.
translated: Edlund, Einar Fredrik, councilman, Norrköping, born May 13th, 1884 in Örebro to contractor Karl Erik E. and Hulda Björkman. Married to Karin Paulini in 1918. Children: Sven born in 1919, Ingrid in 1922. Completed his high school degree in Örebro in 1902, preliminary law degree in Uppsala in 1903, and a law degree in 1906. Became an associate notary in Svea Court of Appeal in 1906, served as acting judge in 1909-1910 and 1913-1915, as deputy county notary in Jönköping from 1911-1912, acting councilman in Jönköping in 1912, third city notary in Norrköping in 1915, second assistant judge in 1922, first assistant judge in 1923, third councilman in 1925, second councilman in 1935, and first councilman since 1941 and head of the courthouse's second department. Served as auditor at the military district court in Norrköping from 1917-1919. Commissioned by the board of h. Norrk. Ensk. Bank (now Östergötl. Ensk. Bank) in Norrköping since 1920, chairman of the building commission since 1925, in the board of Norrköp. hand:gymn. since 1935 and in the general plan committee since 1937, vice chairman of the emergency management committee since 1939. RNO, RVO, Norrköping City St. Olaf's Medal.
